001package com.github.siroshun09.configapi.bungee;
002
003import com.github.siroshun09.configapi.common.FileUtils;
004import net.md_5.bungee.api.plugin.Plugin;
005import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
006
007import java.io.IOException;
008import java.io.InputStream;
009import java.nio.file.Files;
010import java.util.Objects;
011
012/**
013 * This class extends {@link BungeeYaml} to use plugin resources.
014 * <p>
015 * Using null for @NotNull argument will cause a {@link NullPointerException}.
016 */
017public class BungeeConfig extends BungeeYaml {
018
019    private final Plugin plugin;
020    private final String fileName;
021    private final boolean resource;
022
023    /**
024     * Creates an {@link BungeeConfig} with given yaml file.
025     * <p>
026     * This constructor loads the file automatically.
027     * The file path to load or create is {@code /plugins/PLUGIN_NAME/FILE_NAME}
028     *
029     * @param plugin   A plugin instance.
030     * @param fileName Loads or creates file name.
031     * @param resource If the file does not exist, should it be copied from the plugin jar.
032     */
033    public BungeeConfig(@NotNull Plugin plugin, @NotNull String fileName, boolean resource) {
034        super(plugin.getDataFolder().toPath().resolve(fileName), false);
035
036        Objects.requireNonNull(plugin, "plugin must not be null.");
037        Objects.requireNonNull(fileName, "fileName must not be null.");
038
039        this.plugin = plugin;
040        this.fileName = fileName;
041        this.resource = resource;
042        this.load();
043    }
044
045    /**
046     * Loads a yaml file.
047     * <p>
048     * If a yaml file is not found, this method will create one.
049     * At that time, copy from plugin jar if resource is true.
050     *
051     * @return True if the load is successful or false if it is failure.
052     */
053    @Override
054    public boolean load() {
055        if (resource && !Files.exists(filePath)) {
056            InputStream in = plugin.getResourceAsStream(fileName);
057            if (in != null && FileUtils.checkParentDirectory(filePath)) {
058                try {
059                    Files.copy(in, filePath);
060                } catch (IOException e) {
061                    e.printStackTrace();
062                }
063            }
064        }
065        return super.load();
066    }
067}
